original_text: Now when Sanballat and Tobiah and Geshem the Arab and the rest of our enemies heard that I had built the wall and that there was no breach left in it (although up to that time I had not set up the doors in the gates),
korean_text: 산발랏과 도비야와 아라비아 사람 게셈과 그 나머지 우리의 원수들이 내가 성벽을 건축하여 허물어진 틈을 남기지 아니하였다 함을 들었는데 그 때는 내가 아직 성문에 문짝을 달지 못한 때였더라

sentences.original_text: Now when Sanballat and Tobiah and Geshem the Arab
and the rest of our enemies
heard that I had built the wall
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 성벽을 건축했다는 것을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: and that there was no breach left in it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그곳에 남은 틈이 없다는 것을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: I had not set up the doors in the gates
